problems.title: Generate All Subsequences of an Array
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an array of integers, print all possible subsequences (including empty subsequence) each on a new line. Order does not matter.

Input Format
First line: N
Second line: N integers

Output Format
Each subsequence on a new line (space separated). Empty subsequence is a blank line.

Example
Input:
3
1 2 3

Output:
(empty line)
1 
1 2 
1 2 3 
1 3 
2 
2 3 
3
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3
1 2 3
Sample Output
8 subsequences including empty
hintsList: At each index: two choices — include current element or skip it
Print current list when index == n

problems.title: Find Maximum Element in Array using Recursion
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an array of integers, find and return the maximum element using recursion (no loops allowed in the recursive function).

Input Format
First line: N
Second line: N integers

Output Format
Single integer: maximum value in array

Example
Input:
6
10 5 20 8 15 25

Output:
25
hintsList: Base case: if n == 1 → return arr[0]
